desc: Designer jewellery from Orkney, Scotland, by Sheila Fleet OBE. Necklaces, bracelets, engagement rings and wedding bands in sterling silver, gold, platinum, and exclusive 18ct Scottish Gold. Every piece made specially for you in our workshop-by-the-sea.

layout.text: A bright and cheerful collection inspired by a photograph taken by Sheila's late husband Rick. Designs are enamelled in Sunshine enamel in our Orkney workshop. A 10% donation from sales of Daisies goes to Multiple Sclerosis Society Orkney.
